SELECT a.idx, a.name, a.weight, a.season, b.type FROM ( select * from food where idx in (SELECT food_idx FROM food_type WHERE TYPE=#{inType})) as a LEFT OUTER JOIN food_type as b ON a.idx = b.food_idx LEFT OUTER JOIN food_allergie AS c ON c.food_idx = a.idx LeFT OUTER JOIN food_ingredient AS d ON d.food_idx = a.idx
a.idx = #{idx} AND a.name = #{name} AND a.weight = #{weight} AND a.season = #{season}
AND b.type not in (${notInType}) AND (c.code not in (${exceptAllergie}) OR c.code IS NULL ) AND d.ingre not in (${notInIngre})
group by a.idx ORDER BY RAND() * (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM food) LIMIT 1
